meanings.sent1: The supe oversaw the construction project.
meanings.sent2: The supe is in charge of the entire team.
meanings.sent3: The supe made sure everyone was doing their job correctly.
meanings.sent4: The supe was like a captain guiding the crew.

meanings.sent1: She used special tools to supe up her car.
meanings.sent2: Adding extra spices can really supe up the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: He tried to supe up his outfit with a flashy hat.
meanings.sent4: Music can supe up any party atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: A good night's sleep can really supe up your mood.

meanings.sent1: The supe arrived to inspect the building site.

meanings.sent3: The supe's hat blew off in the strong wind.
